title.en: The Sunlight of Blessings: A Prayer

text.en: Embodiment of all the victorious buddhas of past, present and future,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa tamché düpé ku

text.en: Supreme guide leading all wandering beings,
text.en-trans: malü dro kün drenpé depön chok

text.en: Heruka presiding over the assembly ofḍākasandḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: khandro gyatsö tsok pön heruka

text.en: To you, Wish-fulfilling Jewel, I offer heartfelt homage!
text.en-trans: yizhin norbu khyé la nying né dü

text.en: I have no greater teacher than you!
text.en-trans: khyö lé lhakpé lama dak la mé

text.en: I have no practice other than your advice!
text.en-trans: khyö kyi sung lé nyamlen zhen du mé

text.en: At all times, I rely on you as my only hope,
text.en-trans: dü kün ré tö chikpur khyö ten na

text.en: Calling out to you as my wish-fulfilling jewel: may you be just that!
text.en-trans: yizhin nor zhé böpa dönden dzö

text.en: My mental powers are weak and my training slight,
text.en-trans: dak ni lomen jangpa chungwé na

text.en: I have little capacity for renunciation or extensive study,
text.en-trans: pong lok gyacher jé la tu chung yang

text.en: But I visualize you, supreme guru, inseparable from the ever-youthful Mañjuśrī,
text.en-trans: lama chok dang jampal zhönnu zung

text.en: On the crown of my head or in the centre of my heart.
text.en-trans: yermé chiwö tsuk gam nying ü su

text.en: And, with devotion, pray to you sincerely:
text.en-trans: zhukpar mö né solwa deb lak na

text.en: Inspire me so that my share of blessings and compassion is not meagre,
text.en-trans: jinlab tukjé go kal mi menpar

text.en: My mindstream is ripened through empowerment and liberated through instruction,
text.en-trans: wang gi min ching dampé gyü drol té

text.en: And I reach the conclusion of the four visions!
text.en-trans: nang zhi ta ru khyolwar jingyi lob

text.en: In this and all my future lives, may I never be separated from you,
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu khyé dang mindral zhing

text.en: And, by mastering the treasury of vast, ocean-likesamādhisand qualities,
text.en-trans: tingdzin yönten gyatsö ter la wang

text.en: May I remain for as long as space exists, just like Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: jampal yang zhin namkha jisi du

text.en: To strive for the benefit of all living beings!
text.en-trans: malü drowé dön la tsön gyur chik
